markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wolf Fang](/Equipment.aspx?ID=239)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 570 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 4 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You successfully Trip a foe

**Requirement** You are trained in Athletics
</row>

</column>

---

This wolf canine is bound in a strip of leather and tied to a buckle or strap of a suit of armor. When you activate the fang, you deal bludgeoning damage equal to your Strength modifier to the target of your Trip. If your Trip would already deal physical damage that doesn’t include an ability modifier, add your Strength modifier to that damage.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Wolf Fang
